reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and perfect for cooler weather, with beautiful colors and good quality. The fit and size receive mixed feedback - while some appreciate the oversized style, others find it runs very large, and several mention the sleeves are too short. The material thickness also gets mixed reviews, with customers noting it feels thick.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these
items.body: I bought 2 in different colors. I absolutely love them. They are warm and well made. They look nice with jeans and leggings. They are thick, not thin material. Soft and warm for winter. Read more
items.author: Mom2three

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For Colder Temperatures
items.body: I love wearing sweaters when the weather changes and the temperatures get a little colder. I especially love them when I can find them at a great price. This was one of those deals. The color is great, the quality is really good and the price was excellent. Read more
items.author: DB42

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Neck is high and tight.
items.body: I recently purchased this sweater and wanted to share my thoughts. First off, the color is absolutely beautiful—rich and vibrant, making it a standout piece in my wardrobe. The overall fit and sizing were perfect for me; it drapes nicely and feels comfortable throughout the day. However, I did have an issue with the neck. It is quite high and tight, which unfortunately caused me to lose a lot of hair throughout thwvday and ultimately I put my hair up mid day. This was disappointing because I really wanted to love this sweater without any inconveniences. Despite the neck issue, I still think it's a lovely sweater and would recommend it with a caution about the neckline. Perfect for those who prefer higher necklines, but keep that in mind if you have longer hair! Read more
items.author: Bri

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars All wrong when it's already used
items.body: The sweater I received appears to be used. It arrived inside out and is stained. It also has a pulled thread on front. And last but not least, the prior owner probably has a German shepherd. Will be returned but should be trashed. Read more
items.author: Tee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent fit and look
items.body: This sweater is amazing! Love the neck area and how it fits . The feel of the sweater is strong but soft. It washed great, but I let it try dry on its own. I just ordered 2 more ! Read more
items.author: Susan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't recommend
items.body: Not oversized at all. Itchy material Read more
items.author: Candace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Love the feel and the look. It’s soft and is quality material. It’s just thick enough to wear alone or with a shirt underneath. Read more
items.author: Tonya Roberts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable
items.body: The length was perfect, I loved that the neck wasn’t slouchy. It was nice and warm under my jacket and kept me warm indoors. The color was nice and creamy. After a wash and dry in the dryer there was no shrinking. . Read more
items.author: Ferralt

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Nutmeg, White, Apricot, Black, Green, Dark Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
